Post.title: Hello-Hexo
Post._content:
# Hexo
[https://hexo.io/](https://hexo.io/)

##  `nodejs`  `git` 
Hexo[node.js](http://nodejs.cn/)[Git](https://git-scm.com/), `WIN + R`  `cmd`, `node -v`,:
![](Hello-Hexo/node-test.png)

<!-- more -->

 `Git -> Git Bush`,
![](Hello-Hexo/git-test.png)

## Hexo
[Hexo](https://hexo.io/)
![](Hello-Hexo/hexo-use.png)
```
# Hexo
$ npm install hexo-cli -g #`hexo-cli`
$ hexo init blog          #`blog`
$ cd blog                 #`blog`
$ npm install             #`npm`
$ hexo server             #
```
blog:
![](Hello-Hexo/hexo-file.png)
{% note info %} [Hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/) {% endnote %}

# HexoGithub

## Github

##  `username.github.io` 
## Github `New repository`
![](Hello-Hexo/github-new.png)
## 
![](Hello-Hexo/github-create.png)
## 
```
$ hexo new "post-name"  //
$ hexo genernate        //public
$ hexo deploy           //GitHub
```
> ** `hexo g`  `hexo clean`**

##  `hexo deploy` GitHub
22git
1.  `ssh`
2. GitHubssh
3.  `~/.ssh` `config` 
```
Host github.com
  Hostname ssh.github.com
  Port 443
```
 `` 
```
url: http://zyycode.github.io
root: /
```

## GitHub Desktop
[Github Desktop](https://desktop.github.com/)
 `file -> clone repository`  `public`  `zyycode.github.io` 
![](Hello-Hexo/github-desktop.png)
![](Hello-Hexo/github-desktop-use.png)

## 
[https://zyycode.github.io/](https://zyycode.github.io/)

# Hexo

## Hexo
> [Next](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/)

`Hexo`  `git`   `~\blog\themes` , `` 
```
theme: next
```
## 
```
$ hexo new page categories
$ hexo new page tags
```
[](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/theme-settings.html#categories-page)
[](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/theme-settings.html#tags-page)
## [](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/third-party-services.html#local-search)
## [](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/third-party-services.html#comment-system)
## [](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/theme-settings.html#reward)
## [404](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/theme-settings.html#volunteer-404)

Post.title: Shadowsocks Setup
Post._content:
# 
Shadowsocks
-  [](https://bandwagonhost.com/) [](http://banwagong.cn/)!
- Shadowsocks
- Shadosocks

<!-- more -->

## BandwagongHost
![](Shadowsocks-setup/bang-website.png)
KVM`centos-6-x86_64-bbr` 
OpenVZ advantages:
- IPv6 support
- Better CPU performance
KVM advantages:
- Full virtualization
- Custom kernel support (BBR, etc)
- Docker support
- Better isolation
- Better network throughput
![](Shadowsocks-setup/buy.png)
,
![](Shadowsocks-setup/login.png)
![](Shadowsocks-setup/login-server.png)
`centos-6 x86``Shadowsocks Serve`r,PC
## Shadowsocks
windows
[](https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-windows/releases)
![](Shadowsocks-setup/ss.png)

Post.title: Windows tree
Post._content:
# 

[Vue.js](https://cn.vuejs.org/v2/guide/instance.html)`tree`
![](./Windows-tree/todo-item.png)

<!--more-->

# 

tree:
`TREE [drive:][path] [/F] [/A]`
> /F ;
> /A  ASCII 

 `Linux`  `Mac OS` treeWindows `/F` `/A`

# 

OKLet's do it now ! :smile:

![](./Windows-tree/tree-file.png)
DOS `E:\test>`
DOStxt
```
tree /f              // 
tree /f > tree.txt   // txt
```
